Robert Lynch

Web Developer, Programmer & Entrepreneur

Summary

I'm a self-taught programmer/coder living in Live Oak, FL. Hard work and dedication were key in my learning journey.
I wanted to have a career that I enjoyed that would provide a comfortable life for my family and I.
I became proficient in HTML, CSS, and Javascript languages using sources such as Freecodecamp, Teamtreehouse, and Udemy.
